name: Commune Manager
description:
COMMUNE MANAGER

This game is being built as part of the Historically Accurate Game Jam 6 (https://itch.io/jam/historically-accurate-game-jam-6 )

Welcome to Great Leap Forward, a video game that immerses you in the tumultuous events of China's Great Leap Forward.

In this game, you will take on the role of a member of a Chinese commune during the late 1950s and early 1960s, as the country embarks on a rapid industrialization and collectivization campaign. You will experience firsthand the challenges and triumphs of this tumultuous period, and learn about the historical events that shaped modern China.

As you progress through the game, you will be tasked with completing a variety of missions and challenges that reflect the real-life struggles and achievements of the time. You will work to increase production in your commune, collect resources, and help your community thrive. Along the way, you will encounter historical figures and events, and have to make decisions that will impact the outcome of the game.

Creators:
  1. Nienawisc - Chief Technology Officer, Executive Producer, General Game Designer
  2. Myszon - Music Director, 2D/3D Artist
  3. Los - Programmer

Used Photo/Video/Music:

  1. Posters, photos and propaganda recordings made by the People's Republic of China created during these times
  2. Song "The East is Red"
  3. Song "Red Sun in the Sky"

Used Free Assets:

  1. Pixel Art Icon Pack - RPG by Cainos https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/pixel-art-icon-pack-rpg-158343
  2. Free Pixel Font - Thaleah by Tiny Worlds https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
  3. Fantasy Wooden GUI : Free by Black Hammer https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/fantasy-wooden-gui-free-103811
